UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile information, linked to an external authentication system. This entity stores non-authentication-sensitive user data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity, typically provided by the external authentication system (e.g., Firebase Auth UID).

email.description: The user's primary email address, used for identification and communication.

displayName.description: The user's preferred display name or full name.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user profile was last updated.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a user-defined category for organizing and filtering tasks.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Category entity.

userId.description: Reference to the UserProfile that owns this category. Categories are user-specific. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N Category)

description.description: An optional brief description of what this category entails.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the category was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the category was last updated.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a single task item, including its details, status, and associated metadata.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Task entity.

userId.description: Reference to the UserProfile that owns this task. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N Task)

title.description: The main title or brief summary of the task.

description.description: A detailed description or additional notes for the task.

isComplete.description: A flag indicating whether the task has been marked as completed.

startDate.description: The start date and time for the task.

endDate.description: The end date and time by which the task is expected to be completed.

priority.description: The priority level of the task, e.g., 'Low', 'Medium', 'High'.

categoryId.description: Reference to the Category this task belongs to. (Relationship: Category 1:N Task)

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the task was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the task was last updated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores individual user profile information. Each document's ID is the user's authentication UID. Access is restricted to the owning user. The 'id' field within the document matches the '{userId}' path parameter for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/categories/{categoryId}.description: A subcollection for user-defined task categories. Each document represents a category owned by the respective user. Includes denormalized 'userId' in the path for authorization independence. The 'userId' field within the document must match the '{userId}' path parameter.

/users/{userId}/tasks/{taskId}.description: A subcollection for user-specific tasks. Each document represents a task owned by the respective user. Includes denormalized 'userId' in the path for authorization independence. The 'userId' field within the document must match the '{userId}' path parameter. The 'categoryId' field provides a link to a Category, primarily for filtering and organization, not for hierarchical authorization.
